content: pattern now available for free at canadian living online 1 this cozy aran pillow is the perfect project to enjoy knitting during long winter evenings please note **reading cable charts is required for this pattern ** **row 5** should read as follows k7 p2 *this section worked twice*-->work row 1 of simple braid over next 6 sts p2 work row 1 of saxon braid over next 24 sts p2 <-- work row 1 of simple braid over next 6 sts p2 k7 materials - 3 skeins tanis fiber arts green label aran weight 100% superwash merino wool - 4 5mm needles - cable needle - stitch markers - blocking pins - tapestry needle - 3 buttons 1 1/2 to 1 3/4 ins wide - 16-inch square pillow form gauge - 18 sts and 24 row over 4 ins in stockinette stitch on 4 5mm needles after washing and blocking 1 https //www canadianliving com/home-and-garden/knitting-and-crochet/article/how-to-knit-an-aran-pillow-with-a-celtic-design
